Name: REDDOOR
About the game: Survive endless waves of attacking zombie, earning points from killing. These points can be used to purchase guns and perks in the process, or unlock new areas and turn the power on. Zombies enter the player space by 'RED DOORS'. The game will end when the player dies. On occasion, zombies will drop power-ups such as resupply, nuke, max ammo, time skip, instakill, rapid fire & shadow upon their death, making the rounds tiny bit easier. Player can also upgrade guns using the upgrade station for 5000 points, making guns little bit stronger for high rounds. V5.0 Version - 28 Weapons - 1 Map - 5 perks Life, Health, Reload, Accuracy, Damage - weapon upgrade/rarity system - 2 different currencies Points & Scrap - 8 powerups Max ammo, Nuke, Shadow, Resupply, Time skip, Rapid fire, Instakill, Vampyrism - 3 grenades Grenade, Impact grenade, Distract grenade - Weapon customization
